testimonials.name: Vaibhav Gupta
testimonials.quote: The Barabari Collective helped us build our primary website. It's a multi-page dynamic website with student interactions like form filling, login, etc.
testimonials.likes: I appreciated the team's professionalism, adherence to timelines, and willingness to accommodate extra tasks. There was also great collaboration and friendship among the team, which created a strong bond.
testimonials.improvements: Better overall coordination would be ideal, but it's not a major issue. The team has improved significantly over time.

testimonials.name: Shirley Menon
testimonials.quote: Donation Receipt Generation Tool. The tool has reduced the time by 75% for the activity week on week. Harihar and Drumil were very patient with me. I would advocate using these tools to make our lives simpler. Thanks to the duo I am able to dedicate more time to other time-sensitive tasks in the Org.
testimonials.likes: You were kind, supportive, and made things easier for our organization. That's what we need!
